titlestmt.titleproper: Office of Academic Computing. Publications. 1971-1990. UARC.0181

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

did.abstract: Record Series 181 contains publications generated by the Office of Academic Computing (OAC) and the Campus Computing Network (CCN) at the University of California, Los Angeles, between 1971 and 1990.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright of portions of this collection has been assigned to The Regents of the University of California. The UCLA University Archives can grant permission to publish for materials to which it holds the copyright.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: We are committed to providing ethical, inclusive, and anti-racist description of the materials we steward, and to remediating existing description of our materials that contains language that may be offensive or cause harm. We invite you to submit feedback about how our collections are described, and how they could be described more accurately, by filling out the form located on our website: Report Potentially Offensive Description in Library Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Office of Academic Computing. Publications (University Archives Record Series 181). UCLA Library Special Collections, University Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Record Series 181 contains publications generated by the Office of Academic Computing (OAC) and the Campus Computing Network (CCN) at the University of California, Los Angeles, between 1971 and 1990. Publications include newsletters, journals, reports, guides, and plans relating to computing at UCLA.
This is an active record series; additional University records are expected to be added.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Box 1 contains the following issues of Perspectives, a Computing and Information Systems newsletter published by UCLA Computing and Information Systems - Campus Computing Services: volume 2, numbers 1 and 10; volume 3, numbers 1, 3, 4, 7, and 9; volume 4, numbers 1, 3, 4, 5, 9, and 11; volume 5, numbers 1-10; volume 6, numbers 1-11; and volume 7, numbers 1, 2, 3/4, 5, 6, and 7/8.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Box 1 contains the following issues of Perspectives: volume 7, numbers 9, 10, and 11/12; volume 8, numbers 1-9; volume 9, numbers 1-9; volume 10, numbers 1-5; volume 11, numbers 1-5; and volume 12, numbers 1-2.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Box 1 contains the following issues of Perspectives: volume 12, numbers 3-5; volume 13, numbers 1-6; and volume 14, numbers 1-4.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains the following issues of UCLA Microcomputing, a newsletter published by the UCLA OAC Microcomputer Support Office: volume 1, numbers 1-2; volume 2, numbers 1-6; volume 3, numbers 1-6; volume 4, numbers 1-6; volume 5, numbers 1-6; and volume 6, numbers 1-4.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains the following issues of Checkpoint, a journal published by the Campus Computing Network at the University of California, Los Angeles: volume 1, numbers 3, 5, and 7.

did.unittitle: Pocket Guides to OAC (1981) and CCN (1975).
